name: Guzzlers
description:
"The tongues are really good" - Terry.

Little 2-player game made for Bar SK's #beersk game jam to celebrate their first birthday.

Fill your beer first, or have the most-full beer when the timer reaches zero. There's no bonus points for puking your beer into the other mug's mouth but it's pretty funny to do all the same.

Player 1 - A and S

Player 2 - K and L

A+S+K+L to start a new game, or Space if your keyboard can't deal with four simultaneous button presses.

Windows build untested. Let me know if there's any problems. 

(In 2017 I am challenging myself to make 50 little videogames to get more familiar with the tools. I make no guarantee that any of the games are good, but that's not really the point. This is game #24 of 50.)
